org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel.figure
Class AeUiPrefs

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel.figure.AeUiPrefs
public class AeUiPrefs
extends java.lang.Object

Defines the draw preferences such as line colors.
